name: Minotaur Skeleton
languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

actions.name: Greataxe
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 17 (2d12+4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Gore
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 11 (2d6+4) piercing damage.

special_abilities.name: Charge
special_abilities.desc: If the minotaur skeleton moves at least 10 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a Gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 14 STR save or be pushed up to 10 feet away from the skeleton and knocked prone.

special_abilities.name: False Appearance
special_abilities.desc: While the minotaur skeleton remains motionless and prone, it is indistinguishable from an inanimate minotaur skeleton.

special_abilities.name: Labyrinthine Memories
special_abilities.desc: The minotaur skeleton has advantage on checks and saves to avoid becoming lost or to recall a path it has previously traveled.

special_abilities.name: Undead Nature
special_abilities.desc: The skeleton doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

special_abilities.name: Undead Resilience
special_abilities.desc: The skeleton is immune to poison damage, to exhaustion, and to the poisoned condition.
